meta.name: Zenox
meta.about:
於2016年創辦,Zenox係一個由一群機迷成立,專營電競家具以及周邊產品嘅香港品牌,致力為你帶黎更高嘅遊戲體驗。
Established in 2016, Zenox is a Hong Kong brand that specialises in Gaming Chairs, Desks, and Peripherals.

meta.name: Zenox Gaming Chair +852
meta.about:
🇭🇰Zenox Racing and Gaming Chairs and Desks. Hong Kong brand. Established by a group of passionate 90s.
門市地址 : 九龍彌敦道750號太子始創中心2樓236舖

meta.name: Zenox
meta.about:
Zenox is a Hong Kong brand specialising in gaming and racing chairs to lift your gaming experience and performance.

Mission
We strive to provide you with high quality racing and gaming chairs and furniture that elevate gaming experience 
by improving gamers' health, comfort and performance.



Zenox係一個專營電競椅嘅香港品牌，致力為你帶黎更高嘅遊戲體驗.

我地嘅宗旨係為廣大玩家提供高質素嘅電競椅同傢俱,
提高你打機時嘅健康同舒適,
令你嘅表現得到全面嘅突破.
